verses.verse: The elder, <S%G4245><s%> to the chosen <S%G1588><s%> lady <S%G2959><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> her <S%G846><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> love <S%G25><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth; <S%G225><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> only, <S%G3441><s%> but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> those who know <S%G1097><s%> the truth; <S%G225><s%>

for <S%G1223><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>'s sake, which <S%G3588><s%> remains <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> us, <S%G2254><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> it will be <S%G2071><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever: <S%G165><s%>

Grace, <S%G5485><s%> mercy, <S%G1656><s%> and peace <S%G1515><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> us, <S%G2257><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> the Father, <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of the Father, <S%G3962><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> love. <S%G26><s%>

I rejoice <S%G5463><s%> greatly <S%G3029><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I have found <S%G2147><s%> some of <S%G1537><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> walking <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> truth, <S%G225><s%> even as <S%G2531><s%> we have been <S%G2983><s%> commanded <S%G1785><s%> by <S%G3844><s%> the Father. <S%G3962><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> I beg <S%G2065><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> dear lady, <S%G2959><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> though I wrote <S%G1125><s%> to you <S%G4671><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> commandment, <S%G1785><s%> but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> we had <S%G2192><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning, <S%G746><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we love <S%G25><s%> one another. <S%G240><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> love, <S%G26><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we should walk <S%G4043><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> commandments. <S%G1785><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the commandment, <S%G1785><s%> even <S%G2443><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> you heard <S%G191><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning, <S%G746><s%> that you should walk <S%G4043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> it. <S%G846><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> deceivers <S%G4108><s%> have gone out <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> those who don't <S%G3361><s%> confess <S%G3670><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh. <S%G4561><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the deceiver <S%G4108><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Antichrist. <S%G500><s%>

Watch <S%G991><s%> yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> we don't <S%G3361><s%> lose <S%G622><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> we have accomplished, <S%G2038><s%> but <S%G235><s%> that we receive <S%G618><s%> a <S%G3408><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> reward. <S%G3408><s%>

Whoever <S%G3956><s%> transgresses <S%G3845><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> doesn't <S%G3361><s%> remain <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the teaching <S%G1322><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> He who remains <S%G3306><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the teaching, <S%G1322><s%> <S%G5547><s%> the same has <S%G2192><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> the Father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Son. <S%G5207><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> comes <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> doesn't <S%G3361><s%> bring <S%G5342><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> teaching, <S%G1322><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> receive <S%G2983><s%> him <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> your house, <S%G2532><s%> and don't <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3004><s%> welcome <S%G5463><s%> him, <S%G846><s%>
for <S%G1063><s%> he who <S%G3004><s%> welcomes <S%G5463><s%> him <S%G846><s%> participates <S%G2841><s%> in <S%G2041><s%> his <S%G846><s%> evil <S%G4190><s%> works. <S%G2041><s%>

Having <S%G2192><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> things to write <S%G1125><s%> to you, <S%G5213><s%> I don't <S%G3756><s%> want <S%G1014><s%> to do so with <S%G1223><s%> paper <S%G5489><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ink, <S%G3188><s%> but <S%G235><s%> I hope <S%G1679><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to speak <S%G2980><s%> face <S%G4750><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> face, <S%G4750><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> may be <S%G5600><s%> made full. <S%G4137><s%>
The children <S%G5043><s%> of <S%G79><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> chosen <S%G1588><s%> sister <S%G79><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you. <S%G4571><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
